title: Cassandra Wilson - Closer to You - The Pop Side (2009) [Jazz][mp
description:
Cassandra Wilson - Closer to You: The Pop Side 
Audio CD: April 7, 2009 
Original Release Date: April 7, 2009 
Label: Blue Note Records 
Bitrate: 320 Kbps

You've got to be in the mood for this and of a certain age, it's deep and dark. Maybe it's beause Cassandra touches me fathoms below the happy medium, and is born in my year, that her voice always brings me through tears to a place of calm. Moody Blue. We know how the sad story ends, but she's got the grit to retell it in a beguiling way, like an inner voice and honest companion, a conscience acknowledging pain with dignity. Not everybody's bag, but mine for sure. A requiem. It isn't honey; more like molasses. ~ Christophe M, Hawthorne

Cassandra Wilson - Closer to You: The Pop Side Tracks:
01  Love is Blindness 
02  Time After Time 
03  Fragile 
04  Closer to You 
05  Last Train to Clarksville 
06  The Weight 
07  Tupelo Honey 
08  Harvest Moon 
09  I Can't Stand the Rain 
10  Lay Lady Lay 
11  Wichita Lineman
